title: This New Rewards System Is Absolute BS
body: Look its almost impossible to get new champions now. Riot has made this game so not begeniner friendly its not even funny. Riot you need to change the BE system. Add more quests or something. Tie in champion mastery or something right now League Of Legends has just stooped so low.

replies.body:
Most people are focusing on how quickly they earn BE and missing the old school ways of unlocking champions, upgrading champion shards. The cost of activating a champion shard is a good deal less than buying them outright. 

There are many options to earn BE, and a couple different ways of unlocking champions, but feedback is definitely appreciated. However, there's not much we can do with feedback here in Help & Support since we aren't developers. Make sure you submit feedback to the appropriate place, in this case, that'd be [**Riot Cactopus' post over here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/hAaYMrEs-leveling-and-rewards-early-impressions-and-adjustments).

"the old school ways of unlocking champions, upgradion champion shards." Yeah, because the chances are pretty high that i will receive the one i want when these shitty shards drop for already owned champs. Would not be an issue if you wouldn't get shards for champions you already one. I love these capsules with 5 champs of 450 or 1350 be. Sarcasm off.
